reviewText: As a German teacher, I was disappointed that "Europe" apparently only consists of France and Spain for this series. I gifted them to my World Language colleagues as I had no use for them in my classroom.

I have seen 2 of these shows on Discovery HD Theatre.  I am a Spanish teacher and I have not see a video that covers the festivals in Spain that does them any justice as these documentaries do.  What is rare is that each documentary captures the "emotion" of the people and you feel you are a part of the festival.  I highly recommend.
